extendedIngredients.name: silken tofu
extendedIngredients.originalString: 7 ounces silken tofu, about half a container

recipes.title: Pretzel Fudge Pops: Sweet and Salty Frozen Treats

winePairing.pairingText: Cream Sherry, Moscato d'Asti, and Port are great choices for Treat. A common wine pairing rule is to make sure your wine is sweeter than your food. Delicate desserts go well with Moscato d'Asti, nutty desserts with cream sherry, and caramel or chocolate desserts pair well with port. You could try NV Solera Cream Sherry. Reviewers quite like it with a 4.5 out of 5 star rating and a price of about 17 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: NV Solera Cream Sherry
productMatches.description: The Solera Cream Sherry has a brilliant amber and deep copper hue. With butterscotch and pecan aromas, the sweet salted nut and brown spice aromas carry a complex caramel accent. A sweet entry leads to a rounded, lush, moderately full-bodied palate with a lengthy, flavorful finish.

recipes.instructions: Place all ingredients minus the pretzels into a blender and blend until totally smooth.Fill shot glasses with mixture and place pretzel rods in center of each.Place in the freezer until solid. Allow to soften slightly before trying to remove.

steps.step: Place all ingredients minus the pretzels into a blender and blend until totally smooth.Fill shot glasses with mixture and place pretzel rods in center of each.
Place in the freezer until solid. Allow to soften slightly before trying to remove.
